SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
REBATE MANAGEMENT
Set Up Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management

Set up features for Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management. Enable the required features in Setup. Assign users the necessary permission sets. Set up object access, and configure the required settings for Experience Cloud site.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions that have Rebate Management enabled.
Enable Rebate Management
To access Rebate Management objects in your org, you must enable the feature in Setup. When you enable the feature, the predefined templates for Flow builder, Data Processing Engine, and Batch Management are also available for use. Rebate program managers can create programs and calculate payouts.
Enable Ship and Debit Process Management
To create ship and debit rebate programs, define special pricing terms and benefits, and process rebate claims, enable Ship and Debit Process Management in Setup. When you enable Ship and Debit Process Management, the predefined templates for Flow Builder and Business Rules Engine expression sets are also available for use.
Enable Data Pipelines
To create and run Data Processing Engine definitions, enable Data Pipelines. With Data Pipelines, you can query and compute data available in your Salesforce org.
Assign Permission Sets for Rebate and Ship and Debit Features
Assign permission sets to users to give them access to objects, fields, and features for Rebate Management, Ship and Debit Process Management, and related features. Permission sets extend users’ functional access beyond their user profiles but can’t take access away. You can assign multiple permission sets to a user.
Set Up an Experience Cloud Site for Rebate Members
Use Experience Cloud to give your partners access to Rebate Management or Ship and Debit Process Management. Create an Experience Cloud site where partners can view the rebate program and payout details and submit their claims and proof-of-sale documents. You can use the predefined Manufacturing Experience Cloud template to create a site for partners. You can also use an existing site in your org, or create a site from scratch and add the Rebate Management or Ship and Debit Process Management objects to your Experience Cloud site.
